title: Instructional Design and Technology Innovation Workshop Through Informal Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Instructional Design and Technology, with Over 3 Years of Practical Experience
context.additional_context: An informal learning environment combining smartphone-based online collaboration with offline discussion sessions, focusing on current secondary education practitioners solving instructional design problems through real-world cases.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and critically evaluate the latest trends in instructional design techniques using informal discussion methods
Learners can explain how to design effective blended learning activities in a limited technological environment (smartphone-centric)
Learners can propose actionable solutions for real-world instructional design challenges in social studies based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
